Overview.name: Overview0
Overview.content:
Get an overview on what is new and what has changed in OpenCms 12.0.

Here we only link to documented features. For a complete overview of the improvements in OpenCms 12.0 see the release notes.
We have not yet finished documenting the new features and improvements. This page will be extended over the next weeks. Up to then, please see the release notes to get a complete overview on the features.

Teaser.content: Get an overview on what is new and what has changed in OpenCms 12.0.
